name: Reinforce
tooltip:
Summons <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielDarkKri_Create.spawn_count" style="Red"/> Kuzari to attack enemies.

Kuzari have <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri.vital_health.maximum" style="Red"/> life and deal <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri_WeaponDamage.amount" style="Red"/> damage per attack.
